shortdesc.ph: Destroys the instance and releases related resources.

p.codeblock: public static synchronized void destroy(@Nullable IRtcEngineReleaseCallback callback)

section.p: Call this method to release the instance when you no longer need real-time communication, so that the related resources can be used for other operations. Recommended for scenarios such as voice or video calls.

plentry.pd:
Configures synchronous or asynchronous destruction of the engine:
Non-null: Asynchronous destruction. The method returns immediately, but the engine resources may not be fully released. The callback is triggered after the engine is destroyed.
null: Synchronous destruction. The method returns only after all engine resources are fully released. See .
